"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5575078b6368722f5400077a#post_5575078b6368722f5400077a
[bq="SquiggyBomb"]"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5575070f63687209aa000923#post_5575070f63687209aa000923
Why do you want a Nichijou dub so badly?[/bq]
Because that way it will (hopefully) help Nichijou gain more of a following in the West

I just want people to notice it in all honesty

That and per "@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557507a76368720f740010e7#post_557507a76368720f740010e7
[bq="Shadow the Hedgehog"]"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5575078b6368722f5400077a#post_5575078b6368722f5400077a
[bq="SquiggyBomb"]"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5575070f63687209aa000923#post_5575070f63687209aa000923
Why do you want a Nichijou dub so badly?[/bq]
Because EHAN is a hardcore Nichi-fan?[/bq]
And I also wanna see how it'd go, even if I prefer the subs in the end it'd still be interesting to have watched an anime and gone through the dubbing process as a fan, as no anime I've watched has gotten a dub since my first viewing of the show
